```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library("sf")
library("tidyverse")

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false


# load shape file(s)
# https://www.newportbeachca.gov/government/departments/city-manager-s-office/information-technology-city-division/gis-mapping/data-catalog
newport_beach_shp <- st_read("City_Boundary/City Boundary.shp")
newport_water_shp <- st_read("Water_Features/Water Features.shp")
```

```{r}
# crude map
newport_beach_shp |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = newport_water_shp)
```


```{r}
# make map
newport_beach_shp |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = newport_water_shp, fill = "green") +
  labs(title = "",
       subtitle = "",
       caption = "",
       x = "", y = "") +
  
  # xlim(long_min, long_max) +
  # ylim(lat_min, lat_max) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#7fcdff"),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
        plot.title = element_text(color = "#2ca25f", face = "bold",
                                  size = 48, hjust = 0.5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "#2ca25f",
                                  size = 36, hjust = 0.5),
        plot.caption = element_text(color = "#2ca25f",
                                  size = 24, hjust = 0.5))
```
